description: Professional text-to-video generation with advanced motion control and high-quality output from ByteDance

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A professional dancer performing contemporary dance in a modern studio...

duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video

motion_strength.description: Control the amount of motion in the generated video

quality.description: Quality level of the generated video

prompt_details.style_guide: Focus on dynamic movement, dance, and performance-oriented content with professional quality
best_practices: Include specific dance styles or performance types
Describe rhythm, flow, and choreographic elements

example_prompts.title: Contemporary Dance
example_prompts.prompt: A professional dancer performing contemporary dance in a modern studio, fluid movements expressing emotion through graceful extensions and turns, dramatic lighting creating shadows that enhance the choreography

example_prompts.title: Street Dance Performance
example_prompts.prompt: A breakdancer executing dynamic moves on an urban street, spinning and freezing with precise control, neon lights reflecting off wet pavement, crowd gathering to watch the performance

request.prompt: A ballet dancer practicing at the barre, graceful movements and perfect form

example_requests.title: High-Energy Performance
example_requests.description: Dynamic dance performance with high motion

request.prompt: A hip-hop crew performing synchronized choreography on stage, energetic movements with dramatic lighting and stage effects
A modern dancer moving through abstract choreography, flowing fabric and artistic lighting creating visual poetry

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: SeeDANCE excels at dance and performance content
Higher motion strength creates more dynamic movements
Ultra quality provides the best results for professional use
Longer durations allow for complete dance sequences
Use specific dance terminology for better results
limitations: Optimized for dance and performance content
Ultra quality increases processing time significantly
Complex group choreography may be challenging
Best results with single performer or small groups

pricing.estimated_cost: Premium pricing, ultra quality costs more
